title: Let me clear it
body: When leaving a game and someone dodged queue or something the notification is directly over the shop and loot page. It sits there for a little bit and I cant clear it can we get an x so we can close that down?

replies.body: Ahhhhh yea sometimes those notifications can take a little bit to go away. We don't have a way to force it to close at this moment, unless it's the gift notification which does have the little x.
